title: kAnhA kab
sahitya:
kAnhA kab ghar mO AyE erI Ali rI gaurI


caraNam 1    sOvat thI jab apnE mandir mE supan mO An gayE din nahi cain rain nidra tan man vikal bhayE
 caraNam 2    vrndAvan kE kunjagalin mO gAvat tAn nayE jAkE chavi kU nirakat nisadin mOhE nAr gAyE
 caraNam 3    dhEn carAvat gOkul madhuvan bansIvat mO chAyE padmanAbhprabhu phaNi parashAyi jugjug nAthjayE
